title: What is the second font used in the Duck Dynasty Promo between show segments? Script, Retro. Not Thirsty Soft but close.
content: I've seen it and I thought I had it but I can't find it. It's close to Thirsty Soft but much harder edges.
author: Randy Martin

comments.content:
Screenshot? Link?

> It's close to Thirsty Soft but much harder edges

Maybe (non-soft) Thirsty Script? ( [http://www.myfonts.com/search/name%3Athirsty/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317202216/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/name%3Athirsty/ "http://www.myfonts.com/search/name%3Athirsty/"))

Or Wisdom Script? ( [http://www.losttype.com/font/?name=wisdom%20script](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317202216/http:/www.losttype.com/font/?name=wisdom%20script "http://www.losttype.com/font/?name=wisdom%20script"))
